Champions League
Naples: the players and Ancelotti rebel against their president!
After the draw between Napoli and Salzburg (1-1), yesterday in group E of the Champions League, players Napoli and Ancelotti rebelled against their president.
06 Nov 2019, 08:40 by Hugo Deloraine



SSC Napoli Naples is fed up with its status as second behind Juventus and it shows. The Gli Azurri have only one goal for this season: ScudettoIcon Sport

Naples: the possible eleven of the season




It's the crisis in Napoli! While the president De Laurentis, imposed a green bet to his players against the opinion of his coach Carlo Ancelotti until the end of the week, following the bad series of his team in Serie A (9 points in 7 matches), this decision did not have the desired effect. Indeed, the Neapolitan players failed to win against Salzburg yesterday in Group E Champions League (1-1). Worse, players and staff rebelled against their president after the match!




Ancelotti, absent from the press point




Naples + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Thus, after the meeting, Carlo Ancelotti decided not to appear in front of the press which implies that the Neapolitan club will have to pay a fine to UEFA. In addition, all players decided to go home on their own instead of taking the bus from the club to the training center, as a sign of casualness to President De Laurentis. The coming days, risks not being very happy in Napoli.
